Name: Shattered Runes
About the game: Shattered Runes is a fast-FPS in which you fight your enemies with magic. Choose from 186 unique spells to shape your own playstyle and defeat your opponents. Current features : 186 magic spells : Each one has its own effect on the environment Innovative gameplay : Magic spells are composed by following particular combinations with your mouse position and pressed keys Simple class system : Build your own set of 4 favorite spells to use in game Important note : The game is on early development stage, if you want to learn more about it, join the official Discord server (link provided in the game). Also, if you need help understanding some aspects of the game, feel free to follow the official YouTube channel.
